articles.description: England recall Rehan Ahmed as one of three frontline spinners for the series decider against Pakistan in Rawalpindi.
articles.title: Pakistan v England: Rehan Ahmed and Gus Atkinson recalled in Rawalpindi

articles.description: The Commonwealth Games will take place in 2026 after Glasgow stepped in to host, but the stripped-back event has left some celebrating and others disappointed.
articles.title: Commonwealth Games: Biggest winners and losers as Glasgow 2026 reveals 10 sports included

articles.description: Five-time Premier League winner Patrice Evra says the future at Manchester United is "not bright" with his old club having been "in a chaos" for more than a decade.
articles.title: Manchester United: 'Chaos' at Old Trafford goes back to Sir Alex Ferguson departure - Patrice Evra

articles.description: Former Australia opener David Warner says he is available to come out of Test retirement for the upcoming series against India.
articles.title: David Warner: Former Australia opener 'available' for India series despite Test retirement

articles.description: Nottingham Forest owner Evangelos Marinakis was given a five-match stadium ban for spitting on the floor as the referee walked past him.
articles.title: Evangelos Marinakis: Nottingham Forest owner given stadium ban for spitting towards officials

articles.description: BBC F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions following the United States Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Lando Norris and Max Verstappen US Grand Prix battle, Lewis Hamilton and Ferrari

articles.description: Barcelona's league fixture against Atletico Madrid in December could be staged in Miami - with La Liga officials hopeful that Fifa will approve the plan.
articles.title: Barcelona v Atletico Madrid could be first La Liga match held in United States

articles.description: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
articles.title: Troy Deeney's Team of the Week: Salah, Son, Jones, Gvardiol, Wood, Young

articles.description: Newcastle winger Anthony Gordon signs a new long-term deal with the Premier League club.
articles.title: Anthony Gordon: England winger signs new long-term deal with Newcastle

articles.description: In a special interview, England spinners Shoaib Bashir and Rehan Ahmed talk about their heritage, speaking Urdu to the opposition and praying with the Pakistan team.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England: Shoaib Bashir and Rehan Ahmed on their heritage
